mapper.insert: insert into public.suppliers (id, name, code, address, city, country, phone, email, url, payment_methods, type_goods, discount_type, discount_available, current_order, notes, is_active, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentMethods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeGoods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountAvailable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update public.suppliers set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_methods = #{paymentMethods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_goods = #{typeGoods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount_type = #{discountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount_available = #{discountAvailable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, current_order = #{currentOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_timestamp = #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_timestamp = #{updatedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, code, address, city, country, phone, email, url, payment_methods, type_goods, discount_type, discount_available, current_order, notes, is_active, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp from public.suppliers where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by id

select id, name, code, address, city, country, phone, email, url, payment_methods, type_goods, discount_type, discount_available, current_order, notes, is_active, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp from public.suppliers order by id

select id, company_first_name, contact_last_name, contact_title, address1, address2, address3, city, country, postal_code, phone, fax, email, url, payment_methods, discount_type, type_goods, notes, discount_available, current_order, customer_id, size_url, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp from public.suppliers where isActive = #{isActive} order by id
